verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns,<s%> let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H7264>tremble;<s%> He is <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> [above] the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5120>shake!<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And He is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thy <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H6918>Holy<s%> is He.

And the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>justice;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H4339>equity;<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H7812>worship<s%> at His <S%H1916>footstool<s%><S%H7272>;<s%> <S%H6918>Holy<s%> is He.

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were among His <S%H3548>priests,<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was among those who <S%H7121>called<s%> on His <S%H8034>name;<s%> They <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He <S%H6030>answered<s%> them.
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them in the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud;<s%> They <S%H8104>kept<s%> His <S%H9381>testimonies,<s%> And the <S%H2706>statute<s%> that He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou didst <S%H6030>answer<s%> them; Thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> to them, And [yet] an <S%H5358>avenger<s%> of their [evil] <S%H5949>deeds.<s%>
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H7812>worship<s%> at His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill;<s%> For <S%H6918>holy<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
